Description:
Which is better - to conquer the world or save it? Whose side will you choose to fight - heroes and villains? The hunt for the Chaos Emeralds opened! The battle between light and dark sides started! Relive two unique adventures with both new and familiar with the heroes and villains. Fight for the fate of the world! Sonic Adventure 2 is back with an outstanding composition of heroes and villains, exciting two-player modes, the Chao Garden and more than 30 levels, in full HD! .
Features Repack:
Do not cut / no recoded .
